name: Version iceraven-1.6.0
body:
## Automated release of version iceraven-1.6.0 browser
 
This is an automated release, consisting of the following changes:
### Change log (commit history since previous release)
 
8f9942196 (2021-02-01) Give addons download IDs like new a-c does so we can look them up from links
c384acf97 (2021-02-01) Welcome to Kotlin, we don't return things
e85a36621 (2021-02-01) Bring back the interface import
04d182fd2 (2021-02-01) Actually satisfy the linter after removing a bunch of Nimbus code
a210d7529 (2021-02-01) Satisfy linter and hardcode Nimbus off
1b87a8b78 (2021-02-01) Let the link-driven add-on install logic build with our collection fetcher
3d8b00f84 (2021-02-01) Drop our fixed version of the old removed search engine provider
6d4a47921 (2021-02-01) Merge tag 'v85.1.1' into upstream-sync
064f42b65 (2021-01-27) Update to Android-Components 70.0.18.
